title: Cheryl catches the eye in a khaki corset top and snakeskin print trousers
text:
She has never been afraid to experiment with fashion.

And Cheryl made her followers green with envy in a sizzling Instagram snap, posted on Wednesday, just days after she celebrated her 10-year anniversary as a solo artist.

The singer, 36, slipped into a sheer khaki corset top as she posed up a storm against the leafy backdrop.

Jungle-inspired: Cheryl made her followers green with envy as she slipped into a khaki corset T-shirt in a sizzling Instagram snap, posted on Wednesday

The T-shirt highlighted Cheryl's slender waist with the corset detailing, which she clashed with high-waisted snakeskin print trousers.

She wore her brunette lock in voluminous curls and amped up the glamour with a full face of make-up.

Cheryl's latest post comes just three days after she celebrated her ten-year anniversary of her first solo single Fight For This Love.

A decade ago: Cheryl's latest post comes just three days after she celebrated her ten-year anniversary of her first solo single Fight For This Love (pictured on The X Factor in 2009)

Sharing a montage of her work over the past decade, the Promise This hitmaker captioned the post: 'I can not believe it has been 10 years since Fight For This Love was released, 10 YEARS!!!

'Thank you so much for all the memories and love for this song. I am as thankful today as I was all those years ago. I appreciate it so much. Soldiers, I SALUTE YOU.'

Cheryl's sizzling snap comes after her ex, Liam Payne, 26, who is also the father of her son, Bear, two, threw a little shade her way.

Dig: Cheryl's sizzling snap comes after her ex, Liam Payne, 26, who is also the father of her son, Bear, two, threw a little shade her way (pictured February 2018)

Liam took it upon himself to reveal that he and Cheryl 'rubbed off on each other in a bad way' and hinted she 'frightened' him during a candid interview about their relationship.

The Stack It Up singer who split from Cheryl, in July last year following a two year romance, also discussed how the pressure of their high-profile romance had led to the beauty becoming stressed over leaving the house.

Speaking on Jessie Ware's 'Table Manners' podcast about the strain on their romance, the star said: 'I think we kind of rubbed off on each other a little bit in that way. In a bad way, actually. All of that stuff puts so much pressure on a relationship.

He said 'For her, if you were going out somewhere, it would take so long to get out of the door because you're just so worried.'

Liam also hinted he was 'frightened' of Cheryl during their romance and said: 'She's strict. She's surprised me sometimes.

When asked if he was frightened of her, he said: 'Let's say I've been on the receiving end of that quite a lot.'

Liam has now moved on with model Maya Henry, 19, with the pair making their red carpet debut at the launch event for Rita Ora's Escada collaboration at Paris Fashion Week earlier this month.
description: Cheryl made her followers green with envy  in a sizzling Instagram snap, posted on Wednesday, just days after she celebrated her 10-year anniversary as a solo artist.
